channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
channel.desc: Tro ma, awn i Wicklow, Chill Mhant?in i ddechrau, ac yn ail ran y bennod, daw'r teulu n?l i'w cartre cyntaf yma yng Nghymru a glanio yn Sir Benfro. This time: Wicklow and Pembrokeshire.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
channel.desc: Mae Emrys a Sue yn teithio i Scottsdale, Arizona ar antur i brynu ceffylau i rai o'u cleientiaid cyfoethog. The pair travel to Scottsdale, Arizona for the world's largest Arabian horse show.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ffermio
channel.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cais Quinnell
channel.desc: Scott Quinnell sy'n ymarfer ei Gymraeg wrth deithio Cymru a chael llond bol o hwyl. This week Scott will be sea foraging, enjoying a 'gong bath' and having a drag masterclass.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
channel.desc: Pennod olaf. Mae Chris yn profi danteithion Copenhagen yn Denmarc. Last episode, and Chris heads to Copenhagen to sample the culinary delights of Denmark.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Clwb Rygbi
channel.desc: Gemau rygbi byw. Live rugby games.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: 3 Lle
channel.desc: Cyfle arall i weld Aled Si?n Davies yn dewis ei dri hoff le. Another chance to see Paralympic athlete Aled Si?n Davies visiting three favourite places.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
channel.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
channel.desc: Sir Benfro yw'r stop nesaf i Beti a Huw, ac hynny yng ngwesty'r Grove yn Narberth. This time, the duo enjoy a feast from soil to plate at the Grove Hotel in Narberth.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
channel.desc: Ifan Jones Evans sy'n pori trwy hanes un o'n rhaglenni teledu adloniant mwyaf poblogaidd. Join Ifan Jones Evans as he dips into the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Eisteddfod '24 Llwyfan y Maes
channel.desc: Cyngerdd byw arbennig gan Eden yn Eisteddfod Genedlaethol Rhondda Cynon Taf 2024. A special live concert by Eden at the Rhondda Cynon Taf National Eisteddfod 2024.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yn y Lwp
channel.desc: Y DJ a cyflwynydd, Molly Palmer, sydd yn ein tywys drwy gynnwys cerddorol diweddar Lwp. DJ and presenter, Molly Palmer, guides us through Lwp's recent musical content.
